title: Beautiful Kitchen, Court Yards, Hardwood Floors
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Alchemy, or Elixr. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday. There is so much to do in this area!

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home with Wood Floors on Rittenhouse Square
description:
The studio apartment home at 2210 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 22nd floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as September 2, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe or Alchemy. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in french ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then grab a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Buy a brookie from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Package lockers
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Studio apartment home on 22nd floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floor
* Large south-facing windows
* Chancellor Street view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 2210 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. We welcome you to tour your new home in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Price posted is for the 20 month lease term.
2-22 month lease terms available!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.

title: Luxurious easy living in this beautiful 1 Bed, 1 Bath condo
description:
Enjoy luxurious easy living in this beautiful 1 Bed, 1 Bath condo located in prestigious Rittenhouse Square. The sleek, sophisticated lobby with 24-hour doorman and concierge sets the tone for this upscale building in the most desired neighborhood in Philadelphia. Eight floors up, the outstanding first impression continues as you pass through the updated hallway and enter into the spacious Foyer with crown molding, hardwood floors that continue throughout, and space to feature artwork. Make your way to the open concept Dining and Living Rooms, large enough for a Home Office, that offer an inviting place to get away from the hustle and bustle of the city or to entertain family and friends. Gorgeous custom-made built-ins in both rooms combine space saving functionality with a high-end look. The wall to wall windows provide an abundance of light and views of the Rittenhouse Hotel courtyard below as well as the coveted Square. Continue to the adjoining, open Kitchen boasting custom white cabinetry, granite countertops, a mix of stainless steel and paneled appliances, Thermador refrigerator, tile backsplash, and breakfast bar with pendant lighting. A bonus, custom built-in desk adds value and versatility to the space. The beautiful view continues in the spacious Bedroom with custom built-in cabinets, unique vanity/sink area, and convenient full size washer/dryer. An elegant Full Bathroom featuring exotic marble tile, custom cabinetry, and frameless glass shower completes this gorgeous home or pied-à-terre. Just steps from some of Philadelphia’s best dining, shopping, and entertainment, 220 Rittenhouse provides all the benefits of living in the heart of Center City.
Inclusions: All window treatments, all lighting, washer /dryer ( as is condition), refrigerator (as is condition), 2 TV's (as in condition). please send a message If you're interested ,Send your number TEXT Me

Plenty of street parking available right in front of the house.

title: Gorgeous 3BR/3Bath New Construction Home!
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, and recessed lighting throughout the house, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants.

Located very close to Whole Foods, convenience stores, Gym, dry cleaners, Fairmount Ave, bars, restaurants, world famous Museums, highways, Center City and much, much more. This location has it all!
Located on the 3rd floor of this massive brownstone you will find a very spacious 2 bedroom 2 bathroom bi-level apartment with all the amenities you could ask for. title: Studio Apts. Available in Mid-October!! Heat/Water Included!!
description:
Sunny, studio apartments becoming available in mid-October!!! Apartments feature upgraded kitchens and baths, large windows and 9 ft. ceilings. Ask about our NO SECURITY DEPOSIT program!! Cats are welcome (add'l fee)! All apartments are rented unfurnished.
Chancellor Apartments is a convenient high rise apartment community in an amazing location in Center City. We are close to most major schools and universities, public transportation, historical attractions, shopping, restaurants and theaters. Center City at its best!!
Rent includes: heat, hot/cold water, 24-hour front desk attendant, free bike storage room, package acceptance service, 24-hour emergency maintenance service, on-site smart card laundry plus card access system and BuildingLink resident services portal access for all residents.
The Chancellor boasts several different studio and one bedroom floor plans. Apartments feature high ceilings, large bright windows, ceiling fans in most units, hardwood floors and breathtaking views of the Philadelphia skyline and Delaware River. Many apartments have large walk-in closets, too!
We have partnered with Optimal Sport Health Club to offer a generous discounted gym membership (we pay your initiation fee!). There are several off street parking lots and garages in the area, too!
